item.title: Mapping Realistic Travel Time Catchments for Public Transport
item.description: In my public tranport planning work at MRCagney, I was often asked how we could better communicate the impacts of frequency and time of day on travel time catchments. A travel time catchment (an “isochrone”) is a map where an area is coloured to show what places are accessible within a travel time limit from a given origin.
